Texts.Eng: Huh? What was that? Security, could you perhaps take a look?
If we do not engage immediately we risk total annihilation! We cannot let whatever this...thing...is tear our noble republic apart!
My fellow citizens... Our collective worlds face a threat unlike any we've seen before. Five major Protectorate hubs have been destroyed in the last month!
The time for action has come. We must join forces now to repel this strange new enemy and stop fighting amongst ourselves over petty nonsense, lest we face unparalleled danger.
To combat the threat, I suggest a toxin derived from the substance we call Aether. With it we could weaponize our greatest tool...
You, Agent! Take the Manipulator and run! Get to safety!
